name: Bookmarks Outweigh Clicks (High-Quality Episodes)
description: Same as Test 06 but using high-quality crypto episodes (C>=3, I>=3) that pass all quality gates. This isolates the bookmark weighting behavior from quality gate effects.

llm_criteria.prompt_hint: Compare recommendations from bookmark-heavy vs click-heavy scenarios and evaluate if the bookmarked topic dominates. All test episodes are high-quality and pass quality gates.

setup.note: Uses high-quality episodes (C>=3, I>=3) that all pass quality gates. This isolates bookmark weighting from quality gate effects.
setup.quality_note: All episodes pass quality gates: C>=2 AND (C+I)>=5

scenario_a.name: Bookmark AI + Click Crypto
scenario_a.description: User bookmarks the AI episode (2x weight) and clicks crypto episodes (1x weight). AI should dominate.

pass_criteria.description: Scenarios produce different recommendations (at least 2 different episodes in top 10)
Scenario B (bookmark crypto) has more crypto episodes in top 10 than Scenario A

validation_method: Run both scenarios with mixed engagement types, compare category distribution in results
if_fails_adjust: Bookmark weight (currently 2.0x in v1.2, tuned in v1.3)
related_test: 06_bookmark_weighting (uses lower-quality crypto episodes that may fail quality gates)
